snippet: The teenager, identified by his lawyer as Radazz Hearns, was accused in Juvenile Court of gun possession and aggravated assault.
abstract: New Jersey prosecutors charge 14-year-old Radazz Hearns of Trenton with unlawful possession of handgun, aggravated assault and other charges; Trenton was shot by police officers as he ran away from them, which has sparked outcry in community, where residents have demanded investigation.
lead_paragraph: The teenager, identified by his lawyer as Radazz Hearns, was accused in Juvenile Court of gun possession and aggravated assault.

headline.main: Charges Brought Against 14-Year-Old Who Was Shot by Officers in Trenton
headline.print_headline: Charges Brought Against 14-Year-Old Who Was Shot by Officers in Trenton
